# 1 About East Kalimantan
> We will be analysing the East Kalimantan province project within our project. Within East Kalimantan, we will analyse the Samarinda and Balikpapan Regency/City.

## 1.1 Background

- Indonesia is going to relocate its new capital from Jakarta to a new city in East Kalimantan, Borneo.

## 1.2 Motivation 
Jakarta has been the capital of Indonesia since 1949. We aim to recommend a new capital city for Indonesia based on the geospatial characteristics of the location.
